loadCommandManager

public static void loadCommandManager(java.lang.String commandFileName)
TODO move this to the io or ui.command package; it doesn't do anything with FSAs. Loads the command configuration files and initializes the CommandManager (i.e. the singleton class that manages and locates ActionCommand and CommandGroup instances.)

Parameters:
commandFileName - the absolute path to the command configuration file.

loadAndExportCommands

public static void loadAndExportCommands(java.lang.String commandsFileName)
Loads all ActionCommand subclasses in the package with the given name and exports them so they can be seen by menu and toolbar groups. Precondition: the given package name contains only classes that extend ActionCommand

Parameters:
packageName -
